name: Abdelraouf Halaby
title: Frontend Developer
brief: “I am a web developer with knowledge of many different front-end and back-end technologies, databases, and best coding practices. Continuously striving to expand my expertise, I am passionate about learning and mastering new development skills. My ability to solve complex problems and implement efficient algorithms has been instrumental in my success as a developer and will continue to drive my growth.”
